metadata.title: CVE-2024-8974 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Information disclosure in Gitlab EE/CE affecting all versions from 15.6prior to 17.2.8, 17.3 prior to 17.3.4, and 17.4 prior to 17.4.1 in specificconditions it was possible to disclose to an unauthorised user the path ofa private project."

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
